title: Echoes of Halden
outcome: Halden’s legacy is revealed through hidden program 'Echoes,' as city-wide glitches expose his plan for collective self-rule. Citizens and Council must confront the truth and adapt to a new, decentralized future.

events.description: Unscheduled system glitches spread across city screens, projecting flickering audio and visual fragments tied to the vanished and Halden himself. Public confusion and curiosity rise.
Council analysts discover a dormant code segment named 'Echoes' in the BCI, apparently triggered by recent data coin activity and citywide protests.
Snippets of Halden’s private conversations appear on public displays, detailing his doubts about absolute control and instructions for decentralized decision-making.
Community leaders and technical crews gather to interpret Halden’s instructions, debating forming new neighborhood assemblies to replace top-down BCI assignments.
Council formally announces the suspension of all BCI-based assignments, encouraging citizens to self-organize essential services following Halden’s revealed vision.
